title: UPDATE 2-Afghanistan v Zimbabwe in UAE 2018 Scoreboard
text: February 13, 2018 / 3:47 PM / Updated 2 hours ago UPDATE 2-Afghanistan v Zimbabwe in UAE 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Feb 13 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 3rd odi between Afghanistan and Zimbabwe on Tuesday at Sharjah, United Arab Emirates Afghanistan win by 6 wickets Zimbabwe 1st innings Hamilton Masakadza c Ihsanullah b Dawlat Zadran 9 Solomon Mire c Mohammad Shahzad b Mujeeb Zadran 22 Brendan Taylor c Asghar Stanikzai b Mujeeb Zadran 9 Craig Ervine lbw Rashid Khan 39 Sikandar Raza lbw Rashid Khan 38 Ryan Burl lbw Rashid Khan 0 Malcolm Waller lbw Mujeeb Zadran 1 Graeme Cremer c&b Gulbadin Naib 2 Tendai Chatara b Rashid Khan 11 Brian Vitori c Mujeeb Zadran b Rashid Khan 15 Blessing Muzarabani Not Out 0 Extras 0b 6lb 0nb 0pen 2w 8 Total (34.3 overs) 154 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-18 Masakadza, 2-43 Taylor, 3-44 Mire, 4-117 Butt, 5-117 Burl, 6-124 Waller, 7-126 Ervine, 8-134 Cremer, 9-139 Chatara, 10-154 Vitori Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Dawlat Zadran 6 1 28 1 4.67 Mujeeb Zadran 10 1 45 3 4.50 2w Mohammad Nabi 4 0 28 0 7.00 Gulbadin Naib 6 0 23 1 3.83 Rashid Khan 8.3 1 24 5 2.82 Afghanistan 1st innings Mohammad Shahzad c (Sub) b Tendai Chatara 7 Ihsanullah c Malcolm Waller b Tendai Chatara 12 Rahmat Shah lbw Ryan Burl 56 Nasir Jamal c (Sub) b Graeme Cremer 51 Mohammad Nabi Not Out 18 Najibullah Zadran Not Out 8 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 5w 6 Total (27.3 overs) 158-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-16 Mohammadi, 2-43 Janat, 3-112 Zurmatai, 4-150 Ahmadzai Did Not Bat : Stanikzai, Naib, Khan, Zadran, Zadran Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Brian Vitori 2 0 14 0 7.00 1w Tendai Chatara 5 0 18 2 3.60 1w Blessing Muzarabani 6 0 50 0 8.33 3w Graeme Cremer 9 1 49 1 5.44 Ryan Burl 5.3 0 26 1 4.73 Umpire Nigel Llong Umpire Ahmed Pakteen Video Ahmed Durrani Match Referee Richard Richardson
